original_text: Some of you are Jews, so people circumcised you. That happened before you believed in Christ. So do not try to change it. Some of you are not Jews. Nobody circumcised you. So continue like that. Do not ask anyone to circumcise you.
korean_text: 할례자로서 부르심을 받은 자가 있느냐 무할례자가 되지 말며 무할례자로 부르심을 받은 자가 있느냐 할례를 받지 말라

sentences.original_text: That happened before you believed in Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너희가 그리스도를 믿기 전에 일어났다

sentences.original_text: So do not try to change it
Some of you are not Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 어떤 사람들은 유대인이 아니다

sentences.original_text: Do not ask anyone to circumcise you
